name: The Trevor Project
description: Free 24/7 crisis support for LGBTQ+ youth via phone, text, and chat
fullDescription: The Trevor Project provides 24/7 crisis intervention and suicide prevention services for LGBTQ+ young people ages 13-24 via phone, text, and chat.
whatTheyOffer:
- 24/7 crisis hotline (1-866-488-7386)
- Text support (text START to 678-678)
- Online chat support
- TrevorSpace online community
- Educational resources
- Trained counselors for LGBTQ+ youth
howToGetIt:
1. Call 1-866-488-7386 (24/7)
2. Text START to 678-678
3. Chat online at thetrevorproject.org
4. Join TrevorSpace community
5. For ages 13-24
